japanese: でも、いくら九郎でも、/雹さんがいる間は、/生徒会長にはなれないな。
english: But even Kuro can't become /president while Hail-san is here.

japanese: でも、いくら九郎でも、/雹クンがいる間は、/生徒会長にはなれないわね。
english: But even Kuro can't become /president while Hail-kun is here.

japanese: では、いくぞ！！/忌野流……鍛錬術！
english: Let's go!! /Inuya... training!

japanese: で、どう？/ティファニーとは一年前から/少しは進展があったの？
english: So how is it? /Any progress with Tiffany /since a year ago?

japanese: でも……なんだか恥ずかしいじゃない。/年下の、それも生徒に習うなんて。
english: But... isn't it embarrassing? /Learning from a younger student.

japanese: つらい思い出しかない山ですが、/今となっては無性に懐かしい……。
english: A mountain with only painful memories, /but now I'm strangely nostalgic...

japanese: で、どうよ？/ティファニーとは一年前から/少しは進展があったのか？
english: So how is it? /Any progress with Tiffany /since a year ago?

japanese: でも、/それはバツたちに否定された……
english: But that was denied /by Batsu and the others...

japanese: つまみ食い？/そんなちっぽけなコトで悩んでるのか？/これだからジャパニーズは……。
english: Snacking? /Worried about something so trivial? /This is why Japanese people...

japanese: では、先輩、/また後で……。
english: Well then, senpai, /see you later...

japanese: でも、ワタシの目の前で/イチャイチャしたら、後でヒドイわよ！/覚えときなさい！
english: But get lovey-dovey in front of me, /you'll regret it later! /Remember that!

japanese: つ、つまり、/がんばるって気持ちがあれば、/大丈夫ってことで……
english: T-that means, /if you have the will to try, /it'll be okay...

japanese: では、お待ちかね！/単位ポイントの順位を見てみましょう！
english: Well then, as promised! /Let's see the Credit Point rankings!

japanese: でも……/成績が思うように伸びなくて……
english: But... /my results didn't improve...

japanese: でも、みんながみんな、/「委員長、委員長」って！
english: But everyone keeps saying /'Rep, Rep'!

japanese: でも、もう少し早く産まれてたら、/先生と一緒に高校生活が送れたのにな……。
english: But if I'd been born earlier, /I could have spent high school with sensei...

japanese: でしょう？/どんなに教材の通りにやってみても、/脚から火なんて出ないもの。
english: Right? /No matter how you follow the book, /fire won't come from your legs.

japanese: ですが、あなたとなら/その勇気が持てそうです……。
english: But with you, /I think I can have that courage...

japanese: では、優勝ボーナスをあげるわ！/取れなかった!c05ビンゴボーナス!c07が、/どれか一つもらえるわよ！！
english: Victory bonus! /You can get one !c05Bingo Bonus!c07 /you didn't get!

japanese: でも……支配だけじゃ、/人を束縛する事はできても、/導く事はできないわ。
english: But... with just control, /you can bind people, but /can't guide them.

japanese: ですが、/人の心を支配するやり方としては、/安易だと思いますがね。
english: However, as a way to control hearts, /I think it's too easy.

japanese: でも……今、ミーは迷ってマス。/予定通りステイツに帰るか、/それとも……。
english: But... right now, Mee is conflicted. /Return to the States as planned, or...

japanese: でも、/やっぱり得手不得手が/あるのは仕方ないですよ。
english: But having strengths and weaknesses /can't be helped.

japanese: では、用があるので/僕はこれで失礼しますよ。
english: Well, I have business, so /I'll be going.

japanese: でも……支配だけじゃ、/人を束縛する事はできても、/導く事はできませんよ。
english: But... with just control, /you can bind people, but /can't guide them.

japanese: でも、女性のお客様ばかりで/男性は少々入りづらいかもしれませんね。/フフフ……。
english: But with only female customers, /men might find it hard to enter. /Hehe...

japanese: つきあってくれてアリガト！！/またね！
english: Thanks for coming with me!! /See you!

japanese: でも、そんなものかもね。
english: But maybe that's how it is.

japanese: つまんないのぉ〜〜。/しょうがないわね。/ホラ、カメラに顔近づけてみて！
english: Boring~~. /Can't be helped. /Here, face closer to camera!

japanese: でも、そんな大きなのも楽しいね！/今度、作ってあげよっか？
english: But big ones are fun too! /Want me to make one?

japanese: でも、俺は一緒に行く相手も/いないんだよな。
english: But I don't have anyone /to go with either.

japanese: ていねいな口調で/接客してくださいましたよ。
english: They served customers /with polite speech.

japanese: では、ご自分だけで頑張ってください。/それでは、失礼します。
english: Do your best on your own. /Well then, excuse me.

japanese: でも、/無理に作らなくていいと思いますよ。
english: But I don't think you need to force it.
